casebody.data:
Mary J. LAWRENCE, Respondent,
v.
Ronald J. LAWRENCE, Appellant. No. ED 106429 Missouri Court of Appeals, Eastern District, DIVISION ONE. FILED: APRIL 2, 2019 FOR APPELLANT: Byron Cohen, 225 South Meramec, Suite 320, Clayton, Missouri 63105-1877. FOR RESPONDENT: Mark W. Hagemeister, 13321 North Outer Forty Road, Ste. 300, Town and Country, MO 63017. Before Roy L. Richter, P.J., Robert M. Clayton III, J., and Angela T. Quigless, J.

ORDER

PER CURIAM

Ronald J. Lawrence appeals from the trial court's judgment awarding Mary J. Lawrence maintenance of $1,035 a month.

We have reviewed the briefs of the parties and the record on appeal and find no error of law. No jurisprudential purpose would be served by a written opinion. However, the parties have been furnished with a memorandum for their information only, setting forth the facts and reasons for this order.

The judgment is affirmed pursuant to Rule 84.16(b).
